name: Website contact details
entities: Phone numbers (from phone links or extracted from text)
special_instructions: Given a start URL {{actor_name}} will find all the contact details on the website.
Data task must contain at least one correct start url in order to have the task to be fulfilled.
If the task requires not to stay within the domain set sameDomain to false
If the task requires to not read iframes set considerChildFrames to false
